description.value: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to expert instead of one of the three skill increases for mature. It gains the @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Mesmerizing Performance]{Mesmerizing Performance} advanced maneuver, rather than the normal advanced maneuver for its type.

source.value: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
